ai-tha-ap315:1.3_0: From the bank of the river Nadatta,
ai-tha-ap315:2.1_0: Seeing the army in the wind,
ai-tha-ap315:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap315:3.4_0: and the fruit of the Buddha.
ai-tha-ap315:4.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap315:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Junior.
ai-tha-ap315:6.1_0: One who is unconscious, and who is senior in peccount.
